block_comment: This block of code implements a timing check on a specific command address line [Function of the block]. It does this by always triggering (always @) a timing check function, cmd_addr_timing_check, whenever there is a change in the 4th bit (index 3) of addr_in, the input address. The function cmd_addr_timing_check conducts the check with a pre-defined duration of 10 time units [Implementation details of the block].
